To paint in verse descriptive half the charms</br>Of those enchanting beauties that adorn</br>A Country Barber's Shop, demands the touch</br>Of elevated Bard; such as can boast</br>Diversity of though, whose brain prolifick,</br>Replete with poignant strokes satyrical,</br>To pen commits its vivifying pow'r.</br>Creating as it runs:  Thus have I seen,</br>Transported seen, in Lloyd's admired sheet!</br>The aukward theme deserving scarce a name,</br>Equip'd in metaphoric stile, approach</br>Sublimity! — How then can I presume!</br>I!  who by scribbling curse of late display'd</br>A woful proof of inability,</br>In Tooth-ach's jagged lines!  again attempt</br>Fool-hardy, to ascend that treach'rous mount</br>Whose base presents a horrid list of those</br>Who, quitting sense, make here their wretched exit,</br>Unnotic'd. — Thus the greedy Merchant steers</br>By former wrecks, or adverse stars, undaunted,</br>Encount'ring fate; again he braves the storms,</br>In hopes success at last may crown his toils</br>And balance disappointments. — So I've found</br>In vain my efforts to deserve applause,</br>Or t' escape the rock of nonsense!  Still I feel</br>Again revive the self-enamour'd joy</br>Commencing Writers kindles! — Now behold!</br>Elate the ensign'd chief obliquely rears</br>Its tessellated trunk:  nor creaking sign,</br>Nor perriwig suspending rudely, dare</br>Approaching incommode its site majestic!</br>Conscious of self-sufficiency it scorns</br>To hold connection with a penthouse vile,</br>On whose e'er verdant brow and round its sides</br>In paint cretaceous honest Ned declares</br>His willing mind, to powder, cut, and trim;</br>Nor asks but single penny for his fee!

Now shifting thought admittance claims, and here!</br>O!  for immortal Hogarth's gift! — vain wish!</br>But could my pen attract the ling'ring eyes</br>Of wonder-seeking wand'rers, how they'd feast!</br>Might glut, and feast again:  Not such the pomp</br>Of Coronation shew, or City's train,</br>Where Taste in splendour sickens:  Here, methinks,</br>Gay Humour's combating with Penury</br>(In spleen-diverting conflict) half subdu'd:</br>Whose jocund presence let me hail! — again!</br>Once more — I doff respectful! — Whether high perch'd</br>On cieling's blazon'd height its friendly found</br>'Twixt bunch of sage and missletoe's fam'd shrub</br>For many a season hung, the suppliant line</br>Artful convolv'd, or whether from side to side</br>Its influence extends, alike its use</br>Benign, which nightly to the full-trim'd fount</br>Of highest favour'd fluid, which can boast</br>Supplying light from darkness, yields support.—

Here, spurn'd from Court and Pride, Arachne's art</br>Inimitable, safe asylum finds;</br>Witness those num'rous waving canopies,</br>Whose symmetry, and wond'rous fabrick, speak</br>An  Architect divine!  In busy strife</br>There view the nimble artist wantonly</br>Forming its silken streamers — now retreat—</br>Now sportive climb the slender filament</br>Of clue corporeal — Here hang in pompous state</br>The treble-border'd urns impregnable,</br>In which sire, grandsire, generations long</br>Have slept securely — Now descend my eye</br>Reluctant, to behold the warlike ken</br>Of pasteboard tribes, in order militant,</br>On shelf enticing rang'd; for here, lest Void</br>Or Scarcity should shew her ghastly front,</br>The gladsome Ceres spreads her choicest store</br>Of viands delicate, whether of pastry built,</br>With divers species pregnant; roast or boil'd</br>Alike their fragrant charms the envy raise</br>Of Hunger's wishful eye — There effigies,</br>With births and parentage, and fam'd exploits</br>Of heroes long since wept! — The margin'd vase</br>Next claims respectful note, diff'ring in rank</br>Far from the vulgar herd of metal harsh!</br>Of Stafford's matchless sons conspicuous here</br>With Asia's produce vies; the ruddy mass,</br>Magnificently burnish'd, equal serves</br>To uses multifarious — Now bedew'd</br>In Lather's Alpine wave, not seldom deem'd</br>Fit bulwark to defend from oven's scorch</br>The Pudding's golden vest; but chief thy worth</br>Inestimable held when smiling Kate</br>To nameless use consigns thee! — Yet unsung</br>The Mirrour's 'lause remains, whose radiant orb</br>Long vainly struggled with the tyrant hand</br>Of fell Mischance!  By many an honest wound</br>In Truth's defence, to form polygonal</br>Its star-like glare's confin'd; Diminish'd not</br>Thy peerless excellence!  Encircled oft</br>With intertwisted wreaths of knotted curls</br>Meand'ring down thy front, in bo-peep mood</br>Thou dart'st thy beams refulgent!  How caress'd!</br>By sturdy son of toil!  who weekly courts</br>Thy undissembling presence; as with care</br>He platts the Sunday grizzle, pleas'd, surveys</br>His smug deport!  in silent joy confess'd.

Struck by that phyz of consequence, I trace</br>The glimpse of reason's embryo in thee,</br>Thou ape of human visage!  Wooden block!</br>What lineage may'st thou boast!  Of centuries growth</br>The star-tipp'd oak for thee was taught to feel</br>The axe's keen resentment; else thy form</br>Had ages past by sons of violence</br>Chaotic rudeness known.  With prongs obtuse</br>The vengeful trident from thy Pericrane,</br>How oft has met repulse!  Whilst placid thou</br>In visibility art seen present,</br>To wrinkled time a challenge! — Thou hallow'd seat,</br>For charms like thine description's impotent,</br>Or gratitude had plac'd thee at the head</br>Of this eye-piercing round:  Thy genial shrine,</br>Like Phalaris' Bull, with patriotick warmth,</br>Thy votarist's breast inspires!  Begirt with thee</br>In glowing accent, how the lab'ring hind</br>(In politicks deep vers'd!) mellifluent pours</br>To P— th' exhaustless incense of his heart!</br>While gaping plow-mates 'bibe the magic din,</br>With nod assenting, 'wail their country's doom</br>And sigh for P—, or Peace! —  But to describe</br>Minutely each delighting object, found</br>In this capacious haunt, (in whose just praise</br>Whole volumes might be fill'd) to abler bards</br>I will it — Whilst to school I bend my flight.</br>
